text: Basshunter, also stylised as BassHunter (real name: Jonas Erik Altberg; born 22 December 1984 in Halmstad) is a Swedish singer, record producer and DJ. He recorded six studio albums: The Bassmachine (2004), LOL <(^^,)> (2006), The Old Shit (2006), Now You're Gone – The Album (2008), Bass Generation (2009) and Calling Time (2013). In addition to his own music, he has written and produced for other artists. He also competed in the seventh edition of British Celebrity Big Brother, the Swedish Fångarna på fortet and the British Weakest Link in 2010. He won awards such as the European Border Breakers Award, the Grammi award for Best Ringtone of the Year in 2006, and the World Music Award. He was also nominated for the BT Digital Music Awards, MTV Europe Music Awards, and Rockbjörnen. He has Tourette's syndrome. ==Discography== Studio albums * The Bassmachine (2004) * LOL (2006) * Now You're Gone – The Album (2008) * Bass Generation (2009) * Calling Time (2013) ==Awards and nominations== Award Year Nominee/work Category Result BT Digital Music Award 2008 Basshunter Best Electronic Artist or DJ Breakthrough Artist of the Year Emma 2006 LOL <(^^,)> e-Emma of the Year Basshunter Foreign Artist of the Year Eska Music Award 2008 "Now You're Gone" Radioactive Hit of the Year Era Eurodanceweb Award 2006 "Boten Anna" European Border Breakers Award 2008 LOL <(^^,)> Grammis 2007 Club/Dance Album of the Year Newcomer of the Year International Dance Music Award 2010 "Every Morning" Best HiNRG/Euro Track MTV Europe Music Award 2008 Basshunter Best New Act "Now You're Gone" Most Addictive Track Musikförläggarnas pris 2006 Basshunter Newcomer of the Year 2008 International Success of the Year NRJ Radio Award 2007 Best Dance Artist of the Year P3 Guld 2007 "Boten Anna" Song of the Year The Record of the Year 2008 "Now You're Gone" Regeringens Musikexportpris 2008 Basshunter Rockbjörnen 2006 "Boten Anna" Swedish Song of the Year Basshunter 2006 Swedish Newcomer of the Year Russ.no 2006 "Boten Anna" Russ Song of the Year Scandipop Award 2009 Basshunter Best Male 2011 "Saturday" Best Male Single Telia 2007 "Boten Anna" Best Ringtone of the Year World Music Award 2008 Basshunter World's Best Selling Swedish Artist ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People acquitted of sex crimes Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:Swedish record producers Category:Swedish DJs Category:Pop musicians Category:Singers from Halmstad
